urls.title: Effects of transport worker union’s strike warning on Finnair flights
urls.description: The Transport Worker’s Union in Finland has issued a strike warning regarding Finnair’s cabin crew between 3 p.m. 20 November and 3 p.m. 21 November 2022 at Helsinki Airport. The strike will have considerable impacts on Finnair operations and unfortunately, we are forced to cancel several flights. We apologize for the worry and inconvenience this may cause you. If your flight is cancelled, we do our best to re-route you to your destination or you can apply for a refund for unused tickets. If you have a

data.text: @ledled123 Hi, we are handling the cancellations flight per flight, and by Sunday evening all cancellations should be communicated. The affected flights are listed on this page: https://t.co/pJiP13zgli. I am sincerely sorry for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: We are forced to start cancellations due to cabin crew strike announced by the union. If your flight is affected, you will get a message and we will do our best to reroute you. We do not yet have the full list of cancellations available. Read more: https://t.co/bDh8ddHjwX

data.text: @jan_deruyck More information on our policy and ticket types can be found here: https://t.co/S2ERYCByjy. In any case, it is always recommended to contact customer service or check at the airport before departure, in case you need to make changes on your reservation. /2

data.text:
@jan_deruyck Hello Jan, 
The inbound part of your booking has been canceled as you were noshow on your outbound flight. According to the ticket rules of Economy Light, changes are not permitted, and the reservation will be canceled in case the flights are not flown in sequence. /1

urls.title: Your Finnair Guide: Hidden gems of Tokyo
urls.description: If you wish to escape the tourist-filled streets of Tokyo, many hidden treasures and intriguing places await. Follow in Finnair Cabin Crew Kaori Kyppö’s footsteps and explore a side of downtown Tokyo full of interesting religious beliefs, local dining, beautiful gardens and shopping – just like locals do. Kaori Kyppö, Cabin Crew at Finnair This quaint downtown area awaits within just 20 minutes of Tokyo Station on the Yamanote Line. While Tokyo’s famous Harajuku area is known as the centre of youth

data.text: Finnair Cabin Crew Member Kaori shares her tips to explore the hidden gems of downtown Tokyo. Discover the interesting religious beliefs, local dining, beautiful gardens and shopping – just like locals do. Read more on our Blue Wings story: https://t.co/xUdfCqWzgO https://t.co/3DsDUWldH8

urls.title: Our top 10 reasons to visit Finland
urls.description: Welcome to Finland, the happiest country in the world! Pure nature, wonderful natural phenomena, cleanest air in the world – Finland has it all. Be sure to include a Finnish sauna, delicious local cuisine and a visit to Santa Claus Village on your bucket list. As Finland has four beautiful, distinct seasons, each with unique things to experience, you might want to plan more than one trip to Finland. There are at least hundreds of reasons to travel to Finland. We introduce 10 of them. Finland has four

data.text: Is travelling to Finland still on your bucket list, or are you eager to revisit the country of the happiest people on the planet? There are at least hundreds of reasons to travel to Finland. We listed 10 of them: https://t.co/10IR8SuIhO https://t.co/Ev0d2URuKO

urls.title: 5 excellent reasons to travel off-season
urls.description: Choosing to spend your holidays during the quieter months gives you the opportunity to enjoy a more relaxed atmosphere and different experiences. Off-season travel can also have more positive sustainability impact. Here are our five good reasons to travel outside the high season. In many holiday destinations, tourism is the main source of income for locals. When the tourist season is focused around only a few months, a large part of the year can be very challenging financially for the area. Travelling

data.text: Choosing to spend your holidays during the quieter months gives you the opportunity to enjoy a more relaxed atmosphere and different experiences. Here are our five good reasons to travel outside the high season: https://t.co/eT5et36IwM

urls.title: Takaisinmaksu
urls.description: Tällä lomakkeella voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lipusta tai lento-osuudesta, tai maksullisesta lisäpalvelusta kuten istuinpaikasta tai ateriasta.

data.text: @hessumakela @FinnairSuomi Mikäli joudumme muuttamaan istuinpaikkaasi, pyrimme tarjoamaan sinulle vastaavan vaihtoehtoisen paikan (esim. ikkunapaikka -> ikkunapaikka). Jos et saa ostamaasi tai vastaavaa paikkaa, voit hakea takaisinmaksua: https://t.co/VnqI8SUKHR. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair 2/2

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

urls.title: Rovaniemi – Discover the magic of Lapland in the Arctic circle
urls.description: Blue hour, the midnight sun, the dance of the northern lights and wonderful autumn landscapes, where nature is dressed in its best glory. In Rovaniemi, you can experience unique wild nature, authentic flavours from Lapland and the heartbeat of the capital of Lapland. Rovaniemi is a charming city of Lapland in the middle of unique arctic nature. Just choose the most suitable season for you and head to experience the real magic of Lapland! A special feature of Rovaniemi is the fantastic nature spots in the

urls.title: Flight bookings | select country and language
urls.description: Finnair flies the shortcut between Europe and Asia. Start by selecting your country and preferred language and then proceed to booking your flights.

urls.title: Inspiration, information and travel extras to make your holiday planning easy
urls.description: Planning your next unforgettable holiday is easy with Finnair’s wide range of digital services. There are several services available on Finnair.com that will help you to easily plan your trip and also tailor your journey with travel extras. Still deciding on your next destination? Check out our Flight offers page to find out which destinations we currently have in our network, and what the starting from fares are. You can also search destinations by country and see, for instance, all our destinations in

data.text: Our wide range of different digital services helps you to plan your next trip. Whether you’re looking for travel inspiration or information, you’ll find it easily on https://t.co/WWKAxOF6dL. Read our Blue Wings story to get started! https://t.co/kSJAiR8E61

urls.title: Reach more holiday destinations via Dallas
urls.description: Finnair's new route to Dallas opens great flight connections. You can now easily get to some of the freshest and sunniest travel destinations around the Americas. With a new, fast route to Dallas from Helsinki reaching the Americas is easier than ever. American Airlines has a wide network of connecting flights to North, Central and South America from Dallas, offering swift access to favourite holiday destinations. Here are some of our best picks of where you should travel via Dallas. American Airlines

urls.title: Why not add a touch of luxury to your Finnair travel experience
urls.description: If you’re like most people, travelling for a holiday might be the highlight of the year for you. We’ve gathered five tips for you to enjoy your vacation to the fullest. With our travel extras you elevate your travel experience and make your journey to look like you. The easiest way to tailor your journey is with Finnair mobile app. In our Business Class you elevate your journey to the next level with maximum comfort, space and privacy, delicious meals with matching beverages and top-class service. The

data.text: Is your long-awaited holiday coming up? Why not add a touch of luxury to your travel experience? With our travel extras, you can tailor your journey to make the most of it: https://t.co/POBCR9OLbz

urls.description: Security control is required before entering the gate area and when transferring to and from a non-Schengen country. Read more about security check and Priority Security.

data.text: We regularly receive questions about security control, and we've collected answers to them on our website. Before proceeding to the gate area, you will have to go through security control. This may also be required when transferring to a connecting flight. https://t.co/39Y1QOh7Ko

urls.title: Get into the spirit of the season at charming Christmas markets
urls.description: Nothing gets you in the seasonal state of mind better than a visit to a traditional Christmas market. Grab a steaming cup of mulled wine. Fill Santa's sleigh with local crafts. Eat your way through the sweet and savoury treats. Enjoy all the best European Christmas markets offer. Vienna's Christmas markets date back all the way to the 13th century. Today Vienna is truly one of the capitals of seasonal markets, with over twenty of them across the city. Possibly the most captivating visually is the

data.text: Nothing gets you in the seasonal state of mind better than a visit to a traditional Christmas market. See our list of the best European Christmas markets: https://t.co/Jh9FuJnlBr https://t.co/8C1uzEVZwL

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @alanjfowler Hi Alan, I am sorry to hear that you haven't been happy with our service! If you would like to give us feedback, please do so on this page: https://t.co/QnwlxpQKFS. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
